Class Properties

  • br.com.stone.posandroid.hal.api.Properties

  • public class Properties

    Map keys properties in Pinpad.properties.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Properties INSTANCE
      Map keys properties in Pinpad.properties.
      static java.lang.String KEY_CONTEXT
      Key to get android application context on Pinpad.properties map.
      static java.lang.String KEY_PIN_ACTIVITY_WITH_PHYSICAL_KEYBOARD
      Key to set if a PIN input Activity should be displayed even when the device has a physical keyboard. Default value is false.
      static java.lang.String KEY_SUNMI_KEYMAP
      Key to set keymap on Sunmi
      static java.lang.String PRINTER_INTENSITY
      Printer's intensity, varying from 0 to 10
      static java.lang.String RESULTS_EXT_FILE_KEY
      For mock module, used for external config file (sdcard) to dictate behavior in properties
      static java.lang.String RESULTS_FILE_KEY
      For mock module, used for config file to dictate behavior in properties
      static java.lang.String RESULTS_KEY
      For mock module, used for behavior in properties
      static java.lang.String TARGET_RESULT_KEY
      For mock module, used to set/change the source of results at runtime
